Docs.summary: Represents the path to a node in a tree. In iOS this class is most commonly used to identify a row in a .

remarks.para: The API used in iOS with consists of a static method to create new objects and two properties. The method creates a new instance from row and section numbers. The properties and return the relevant values from populated instances.
This class has other uses beyond , which would involve using the rest of the class's properties and methods.
